.. py:function:: plot_per_state_histograms(per_state, state_selection, shape = None, axs = None, fig = None)

   Function to plot the per-state energy, forces and permanent dipole histogram plots.

   :param per_state: A dataset with per-state observable data.
   :type per_state: PerState
   :param state_selection (StateSelection: State selection object to limit the states included in plotting and to provide state names.
   :param axs: The map of subplot-axes. Keys identify the subplots (`energy`, `forces`, `dip_perm`) and the values are the axes to plot the subplot to. Defaults to None.
   :type axs: dict[str, Axes] | None, optional
   :param shape: Optional argument to reshape the per-state plots into another arrangement of rows and columns. First argument number of rows, second the number of columns.
   :type shape: tuple[int, int] | None, optional
   :param fig: Figure to generated axes from. Defaults to None.
   :type fig: Figure | SubFigure | None, optional

   :returns: The axes dictionary after plotting.
   :rtype: dict[str, Axes]
